reviewText: Wouldnt play! Says it doesnt recognize code is from another country

No not good, it was my first bad experience. They would not play at all, I  do not have the original package  to send it back, so not sure what to do now? But I  was not aware there was a region error to look for when purchasing moves, so now not sure if I  should buy anymore movies.
These items do not work in the DVD player or the Xbox. Very unclear as to why.

We love these movies and I thought I was ordering USA compatible. Turns out the copies I got were not playable on any of my devices. Make sure to look at region when buying movies.  Unfortunately some are not clearly marked.
my grandsons love it they fou.d it enchanting. and entertaining. a great family movir
